about_the_game:
DEADED Is a Third Person Survival game where you scavenge, build, survive and thrive through the zombie infested post apocalyptic world. With heavy emphasis on physics and ragdoll - block, push and move objects to manipulate zombies to gain an advantage against them.

Physics and Ragdoll
DEADED aims to create an environment in which realistic zombies interact with. Block door ways with couches, barricade doors with wood and have the ability to push zombies over. These zombies will attack you head on, ignoring objects in their way so use it to your advantage.



Save Survivors
Save survivros you find throughout the city and assign them jobs at your base to produce valuable resources. Make them cut wood, scavenge scrap piles or set them as a security gaurd to help defend against the undead.



Scavenge
Scavenge the city for valuable loots and rummage through housese to find materials to help you and your community survive.



Combat
Shoot, slice and stomp your way through the infected with a variety of weapons such as the machete and pistol, damage any zombies limb enough and it will pop off!



The Fog City
With the ever changing fog city, discover a way to navigate through it without getting lost. As with each entry something always changes, and its up to you to find out why and how to solve a route of safety through the city.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains violence, gore and body dismemberment.

name: Deaded

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 580 / GTX 1060
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

dejus.descriptors:
Drogas ilícitas
Violência Extrema
Linguagem imprópria

short_description: Build your defences, scavenge for loots and survive the zombie infested city saturated with a mysterious fog. Survivors will ask for help but its up to you to save them, or leave them for dead. How long will you survive before you become... Deaded...
